title: Protector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect a player with the power of a GIM role each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may choose a role in the GIM thread with the Protective subalignment. You will be able to use this role's abilities for the night.
- You may use any protective role on yourself, but any deaths that you prevent on yourself will not contribute towards your win condition.
- If you choose a Protective role that would normally result in someone dying as a result of your target being protected, nobody will die in the process, but the protective effects will still protect your target.
- You may not use the same Protective role more than once.
- You must use Protective roles that target a specific player. You cannot use Protective roles that provide blanket protection such as Hero (1020) or Nightwatch (1057).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent two deaths using your abilities.
